span.span: Performs a cryptographic transformation of data.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 释放由 方法使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对的简单调用。This method is a simple call to . 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用方法来释放当前转换使用的资源。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method to release the resources used by the current transform. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform/CPP/members.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform/CS/members.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.CryptoAPITransform/VB/members.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

.method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed
Public Sub Reset ()
public: void Reset();

summary.span: 重置 的内部状态，以便它可再次用于不同的加密或解密。

span.span: Resets the internal state of so that it can be used again to do a different encryption or decryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 TransformFinalBlock 时将自动调用方法。The method is called automatically when you call TransformFinalBlock. `Reset`时，例如，加密的输入的数据是否垃圾回收，且无法进行解密，不会调用方法。The `Reset` method is not called when, for example, the encrypted input data is garbage and cannot be decrypted. 在这种情况下，将引发异常和`Reset`不调用。In this case, an exception is thrown and `Reset` is not called. 你可以选择手动调用`Reset`在此情况下的方法。You can choose to manually call the `Reset` method in this case.
